metadata.feature_description: Test URL generation for specific pages with custom parameters and query strings

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL generation for existing page

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > SEO > URL Management > Test URL tab
steps.expected: Test URL feature page loads with Page to Test dropdown and Test URL button
steps.actual: Test URL page loaded successfully with all form fields visible

steps.action: Select 'Home' page from Page to Test dropdown and click Test URL button
steps.expected: System generates friendly URLs for the Home page across all locales

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL with custom page name

steps.action: Select 'Our Products' page and enter 'custom-products.aspx' in Custom Page Name field
steps.expected: System generates URLs with custom page name appended
steps.actual: Generated URLs with custom suffix: http://localhost:8081/Our-Products/custom-products, http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products/custom-products, http://localhost:8081/es-es/Our-Products/custom-products. The .aspx extension was cleaned by the friendly URL provider.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL with query string parameters

steps.action: Select 'Our Products' page and enter '&category=electronics&sort=price' in Query String field
steps.expected: System generates URLs with query string parameters appended

steps.action: Select '<None Specified>' from Page to Test dropdown
steps.expected: Test URL button should be disabled when no page is selected
steps.actual: Test URL button is disabled and Resulting URLs field is cleared, validating the required field constraint

steps.action: Enter 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products' in URL to Test field and click Test URL Rewriting button
steps.expected: System analyzes the URL and shows rewriting result, identified page, culture, and operation messages
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US, Identified Language/Culture: en-US, Identified Page: Our Products, Operation Messages: ActiveTab: 22/Our Products IsSecure: False

observations: The Test URL feature requires Administrator role access as verified by the [DnnAuthorize(StaticRoles = 'Administrators')] attribute in the code
URL generation supports multiple locales - the system generates URLs for all configured portal aliases (en-US and es-ES in test environment)
Custom page names have their extensions cleaned automatically by the friendly URL provider (e.g., .aspx is removed)
The URL Rewriting test feature provides detailed debugging information including the internal rewrite path, identified page, and culture
